title: Trump administration halts use of human fetal tissue in NIH-funded research
description: The Trump administration announced Thursday that human fetal tissue derived from abortions can no longer be used in NIH-funded research.
content: The Trump administration announced Thursday that human fetal tissue derived from abortions can no longer be used in NIH-funded research.
